description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Phibian is a high score based top down scroller. The game features 3D graphics with three outdoor settings and various creatures to ride and defeat. Pick up as many multipliers as possible while preventing creatures from escaping to maximize your score.
description.short: Phibian is a high score based top down scroller. The game features 3D graphics with three outdoor settings and various creatures to ride and defeat. Pick up as many multipliers as possible while preventing creatures from escaping to maximize your score.
